column4: have a question for someone.  If I want windows to be the default o.s grub boots to, how do I edit the menu.lst file to make that happen?
you change the value in menu.lst which is currently set at something like 'default=0'
count down the menu entries starting with zero
look at the link above that orbin pasted
pastebin the menu.lst and show me the URL
your half right and half wrong :)
that will start the 'sixth' menu entry by default (cause grub counts starting with zero)
